ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordTypeId ="012700000001kI1", ISPICKVAL(Paychex_PEO_Issue__c,"Yes"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received")), NOT(BEGINS(Text(Closure_Code__c),"Withdrawn")), ISPICKVAL(Parent_Company_Client__c,""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Parent Company Client # in PEO Specific Detail Section cannot be blank
